channel.title: Engs on Facile.it Engineering
channel.description: Recent content in Engs on Facile.it Engineering

item.title: Who we are
item.description: Questa pagina è disponibile anche in italiano. Facile.it relies on a big and keen crew of developers. Since 2008, the group’s projects are based on PHP, and as time goes by new technologies become part of corporate know how. This blog allows our developers to share tips and direct experiences with new technologies. Facile.it is the leading price comparison website in Italy; also Assicurazione.it, Prestiti.it and Mutui.it are part of the Group.
